name: part_001
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】白上フブキ生誕祭2024　#FBKINGDOMPROLOGUE【ホロライブ⧸白上フブキ 】 [-a68MSMFuuM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Kagaribito' by Shirakami Fubuki in a snowy forest setting.
Transition sequence featuring the event logo 'FBKINGDOM PROLOGUE'.
Narrative prologue with illustrations depicting the history of the kingdom and the white fox child.
Performance of the song 'Kodairyu no iru kuni' by Shirakami Fubuki.

subtitles.original: 篝火は倒れて 空を焦がす
subtitles.english: The bonfire has fallen and scorched the sky

subtitles.original: 急き立てられるように ゆらり歩き出す
subtitles.english: As if being hurried, I begin to walk swayingly

subtitles.original: 孤独な太陽の様に 繰り返して
subtitles.english: Like a lonely sun, repeating...

subtitles.original: 繋ぎ止める
subtitles.english: Tie it down

subtitles.original: 全ての火を
subtitles.english: All the fires

subtitles.original: 澄み切った青空 岩陰にもたれて
subtitles.english: A clear blue sky, leaning against the shadow of a rock

subtitles.original: 頬撫でゆく風は 「おやすみ」と呟いた
subtitles.english: The wind caressing my cheek whispered "Good night"

subtitles.original: 解れ 解れ 欠片に戻る 現世の記憶は
subtitles.english: Unravel, unravel, return to fragments, the memories of this world

subtitles.original: 霧散の瀬戸際を 未だ見ず
subtitles.english: Still not seeing the brink of scattering

subtitles.original: 辛うじて留める 形を繋ぐ 敢え無い魔法は
subtitles.english: Barely holding on, connecting the forms, the fleeting magic

subtitles.original: 掛け替えの無い 命の影
subtitles.english: The shadow of an irreplaceable life

subtitles.original: 動かぬその右手には クチナシの花束を
subtitles.english: In that unmoving right hand, a bouquet of gardenias

subtitles.original: 地に還る魂に 捧ぐ花向け
subtitles.english: A floral tribute dedicated to the soul returning to the earth

subtitles.original: 残された世界には 縁なしの絶望と
subtitles.english: In the remaining world, there is bottomless despair and...

subtitles.original: 願わくば暫くの 永遠を
subtitles.english: If I may wish, for a temporary eternity

subtitles.original: 昔々あるところに、とても素晴らしい魔法の王国がありました。
subtitles.english: Once upon a time, in a certain place, there was a very wonderful magical kingdom.

subtitles.original: しかし、その王国は争い事に負けてしまい世界から消え、雪の中に埋もれてしまいました。
subtitles.english: However, that kingdom lost a war and disappeared from the world, buried under the snow.

subtitles.original: それから数百年、１人の白キツネの子がこの荒廃した地を訪れ、自分の国を作りたいと願いました。
subtitles.english: Hundreds of years later, a white fox child visited this devastated land and wished to build their own country.

subtitles.original: 争い事の無い輝かしい王国を…もう一度…と。
subtitles.english: A brilliant kingdom without conflict... once more...

subtitles.original: 吹き荒ぶ風に舞う 光追いかけて
subtitles.english: Chasing the light that dances in the blowing wind

subtitles.original: 辿り着いた昔の王国
subtitles.english: I arrived at an ancient kingdom
